definitions.definition: To compose fables ; hence, to write or speak fiction ; to write or utter what is not true.
To make up ; to devise , and speak of, as true or real; to tell of falsely ; to recount in the form of a fable.

main_definition: ( intransitive , archaic ) To compose fables ; hence, to write or speak fiction ; to write or utter what is not true.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , archaic ) To make up ; to devise , and speak of, as true or real; to tell of falsely ; to recount in the form of a fable.
